title: _DVD_BCA_DESCRIPTOR (ntddcdvd.h)
description: The DVD_BCA_DESCRIPTOR structure is used in conjunction with the IOCTL_DVD_READ_STRUCTURE request to retrieve a DVD burst cutting area (BCA) descriptor.
